text:
By Shifaan Ryklief 

CAPE TOWN - Several weeks after reporting its first Covid-19 case in a kitten, South Korea will start testing pets that show symptoms such as fever or breathing difficulties.  #Animals #Coronavirus #Covid19 #SouthKorea #Vaccine
